General.Name: Passat Société Anonyme
General.Description: Passat Société Anonyme engages in the image-assisted sale of consumer products in France. It sells household, kitchen, DIY, garden, beauty, and leisure and fitness products. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Fourqueux, France.
General.Address: 1-3 rue Alfred de Vigny, Fourqueux, France, 78112

3.Name: Mr. Philippe  Baumann
3.Title: Deputy Chief Exec. Officer of Trade, Marketing & Logistics
